title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I am an introvert type person, i don't like to make friends, i have 0 friends in total, because i like to being alone and enjoy alone, what are you thoughts about making friends, being with friends, partying with friends and more, are they important? and how many friends you have? and you like to make friends? or it is a waste of time?

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well I did a test online for this and I am a Extrovert. I like to be a talkative person when we are in groups out to have a good time. My friends will listen to the things I say so I like this feeling. I think it is good to make friends. We do not want to be alone for our whole life. I will party with my friends and I think it is good to be social interactive with people. I do like to make new friends, it is not a waste of time to be with new people.

comments.author: wmaCeyot
comments.body: I very like being alone most times.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: People who like being alone most or all of the time have mental problems that make them this way. They should get help, if only from a friend. It might take work to make changes.Besides, this is the wrong place to ask this question. People who frequent the forum don't like being alone, or they wouldn't be here.

comments.author: Gallo40
comments.body: I prefer to go out in company, with friends for a beer

comments.author: Joyce ukata
comments.body: I love making friends, spending time with them, and going out together. It makes me really happy.

comments.author: Hydee06
comments.body: I prefer friend because we learn everyday.

comments.author: Shujae
comments.body: Being with friends or alone is a someone's own perspective. Both have some advantages and disadvantages as well. Like being alone can promote creativity and being with friends can make you happy if you have fun with them . By the way I have few friends. Sometimes i feel better with friends and sometimes i prefer to be alone.

comments.author: bitcoin-shark
comments.body: I prefer to spend my time in company, with good friends

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: i am on both, I can deal with others? while I can also be in solo mode.if i felt wanting to be alone , I go to mountains and stay overnight.if I wanted to be with someone , then I hang out with friends .

comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: I love being alone at most time and a little bit with friends.Honestly, being alone at most times builds sn idle mind.I would preferably get locked up in a room alone fully blackout and at such time, I am being inspired with the thoughts of horribleness and life aspirations.I sincerely love to meet friends and not to make further friends because I don't intend to build famous ness. I just love the vibes of my current being friends but hope to explore and advances at our endivoirs otherwise I am preferred being alone than keeping unnecessary friends.I can also vividlyÂ  say it that being alone mostly could create a mental impact to the brain because it runs all through meditating the good, the bad and the uglies without a distraction and liable to flawness

comments.author: RTR~
comments.body: The importance of making friends, being with friends, and socializing, including partying with friends, can greatly alter the mind.Spending time with friends can contribute to happiness and mental health. Can reduce social stress, provide emotional support.
